alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:31AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hays, north central Bexar and central Comal Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 731 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garden Ridge, or 7 miles northwest of Selma, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Schertz, Live Oak, Selma, Wimberley, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Woodcreek, Smithson Valley, Timberwood Park, Startzville, Bracken and Sattler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
